title: Inflation, Consumer Sentiment, And Labor
itunes:title: Inflation, Consumer Sentiment, And Labor
description:
Adam Gold, Founder and CIO at Katam Hill, LLC, discusses markets, investing, and the economy. Mari Shor, Senior Equity Analyst at Columbia Threadneedle Investments, discusses inflation and its impact on retail and consumers. Steve Kane, co-CIO and Generalist Portfolio Manager with TCW Group, discusses inflation and the Fed. Tara Jaye Frank, equity strategist, author, and President and CEO of TJF Career Modeling, LLC, discusses the Bloomberg 2022 Gender Equality Index and women returning to work. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
